text: I just pulled up <http://community.HubSpot.com|community.HubSpot.com> on my phone and it's all in Japanese. I'm located in the US. Anyone else seeing this?
What’s more weird is on my computer, it’s english. Same network too. :thinkonk:

I got Portuguese when I tried this now on my mobile.
• Opened the menu that slides out from left.
• There is a language switcher at the bottom.
• From there we are able to switch back to the language of our choice.
